title: Concord Crossing one bedroom w/ht&hw included
posting_body: Concord Crossing has a modern one-bedroom apartment available July 8th.
The kitchen is fully applianced with an E-Star rated refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and electric cooking stove.
The spacious living room has wood laminate flooring and a balcony.
The bedroom offers grey toned berber carpeting and a walk-in closet.
Concord Crossing includes the gas for heat and hot water in the rent.
There is an elevator in the building, additional storage and coin-operated laundry facilities.
Superb commuter location, minutes to Routes 2, 128, 117.
Easy walk to charming Concord shops, eateries and commuter rail to Boston.
Located in picturesque and historic Concord.
Easy commute - minutes to Rt. 2, Rt. 128 and Rt. 495.
Nearby towns: Lexington, Acton, Bedford, Lincoln, Sudbury, Wayland, Waltham, Westford.
Lease terms:
$1,950 per month for a minimum of a 15-month lease.
$2,150 per month for a minimum of a 12-month lease.
$2,350 per month for a minimum of a 9-month lease.
No pets.
No smoking.
Qualification Standards:
Good credit & clean criminal background.
Minimum net income: $66,858 per year on a 15-month lease (not applicable for section 8 applicants).
Good references.
This apartment is presently occupied.
Therefore, we are not showing it at this time.
All interested parties must email their full name, names of all other occupants, and phone number for more information on the first available day of showing.
*Pictures and floor plan are of a sample unit and should be used as an example only*
